result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael S Bredeson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael S Bredeson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael S Bredeson was found guilty of Receiving or Concealing Stolen Property (<=$2500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.34(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant's probation revoked - sentenced to county jail/hoc on 1-3-17; unpaid restitution of $500, court obligations of $448, and supervision fees of $180
Transcript:  Sentencing after Revocation (1/3/17) filed by court reporter Chris Champeau

10:38 A.M., Defendant Michael S Bredeson in court, in custody with attorney Brent Wayne Varner.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel has received revocation order and warrant, Court sentences defendant to: 14 CF 359, Ct. 2, 9 months jail, concurrent to 14 CM 162, 213 days sentence credit, 14 CM 162, Ct. 1, 9 months jail, concurrent to Ct. 2, Ct. 2, 9 months jail, concurrent to Ct. 1, 273 days sentence credit, 
15 CF 35, Ct. 1, 3 years 6 months prison, 1 year 6 months, initial confinement, 2 years extended supervision, mandated to attend Columbia County Drug Treatment Court, consecutive to 14 CM 162, Ct. 2, years prison, 1 year and 6 months initial confinement, 3 years extended supervision, concurrent to Ct. 1 in 15 CF 35, mandated to attend Columbia County Drug Treatment Court Defendant is eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program and Substance Abuse Program, sentence to commence forthwith, 2 days sentence credit, 11:08 A.M.
Sentencing hearing on revocation on January 3, 2017 at 10:30 am.
filed by Agent Shannon Whitish

Defendant appearing on warrant, quashed, per Atty Melka, matters are assigned to Atty Varner, 15 CM 489, $500.00 cash bond, 15 CM 522, $500.00 cash bond, 14 CF 359, $500.00 cash bond, 14 CM 162, $500.00 cash bond,

Cases called: 14CF359 & 15CF35, Defendant Michael S Bredeson in court with attorney Brent W. Varner.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count 2 in 14CF359. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence withheld 2 yr. probation, $550 rest. & surcharge, pay during first year, $343 costs, Periodic review in six months in each case. Defendant pled no contest to cts. 1&2  In 15CF35, sentence withheld, 4 yr. probation, $518 & $268 costs. Periodic review in six months in each case. 15CF35, 2 days jail credit. Ct. 1 in 14CF359 dismissed.
